sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const TermsAndConditions: React.FC = () => { return (

Terms and Conditions for NotiXel

Last Updated: October 4, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using the NotiXel website and service ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.

2. The Service

NotiXel is an automation tool designed to synchronize data between a user's Notion databases and Microsoft Excel files stored on OneDrive.

  • Data Accuracy: We strive to ensure accurate synchronization but **do not guarantee** that data will always be error-free or perfectly up-to-date due to API constraints, internet failures, or third-party service outages. You are responsible for verifying critical data.
  • User Responsibility: You are responsible for properly configuring the sync mappings and for the security of your account credentials.

3. Subscription and Billing (Stripe)

  • Billing Cycle: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring, periodic basis (e.g., monthly or annually) via Stripe.
  • Cancellations: You can cancel your subscription renewal at any time through your account settings. Cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.
  • Refunds: Generally, all fees are non-refundable. However, we may offer a full refund within the first 7 days of a new annual subscription at our sole discretion.

4. User Conduct

You agree not to use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. Specifically, you agree not to use the Service to synchronize or transmit illegal, harassing, or harmful content.

5. Termination

We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

Contact Us: support@notixel.com

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
